full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DMIGS BRTZE MA LA BRTEN PA' BKRU BYABS BSRUNG GSUM BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES BUM CHOG 'DI NI SNYIGS MA'I DUS 'DIR RGYAL PO DANG BTZAN LA SOGS PA SDE BGYAD DRANG SRONG 'BYUNG PO RNAMS KYIS 'TSE BA'I 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN PA'I CHED DU 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES, MCHOD DPON PA SHES DAR PI LIG THU SHES RAB BZANG PO SOGS KYIS BSKUL BA LTAR, DPAL MGON BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS LCAGS KHYI LO BA'I DPYAR ZLA THA MA'I TSES BCU BDUN LA TSE TSEG THU NVA GVA ZHES PA'I SAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DBU @008B MDZAD NGAG DBANG LEGS PAR BSHAD KYIS BGYIS PA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
